Strings.Text: {scroll 0}A moment ago I heard\nsomeone's voice coming from{scroll 1}{clear 75}{scroll 0}\nthis hole.{timed 30}
{scroll 0}\nLet's go together since it's{scroll 1}{clear 35}{scroll 0}dark and we can't see\nvery well.{scroll 1}{timed 80}
{scroll 0}Okay, then I'm going to\ncover you. Let's hurry!{scroll 1}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}Hey? Are you alright? I can\ngo first if you want me to.{scroll 1}{timed 160}
{scroll 0}It may be more dangerous\nif you come behind me.{scroll 1}{clear 70}{scroll 0}\nBe careful!{scroll 1}{timed 50}
{scroll 0}I'll go even if I have \nto go by myself.{scroll 1}{timed 75}
{scroll 0}Barry, I think I'll take\nsome other route.{scroll 1}{timed 95}
{scroll 0}I see... yeah, maybe you\nshould. Be careful!{scroll 1}{timed 105}
{scroll 1}Do you want him to go first?\n{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
